title: Unable to play games on the Beta Client
body:
Since 2 months I am unable to play games on the Beta Client because it says to me the following:
"We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we´ll try to patch it up to the latest version."
 When i log into my account the Play button will be permanently greyed out and  I don´t know how to fix this Problem.(I can still play games on the Legacy Client.)
I have also tried to Repair via the Repair function in the Client, the HRT and completely reinstalling LoL.

replies.body:
It sounds like your patcher needs to repair some game files, but for one reason or another, it can't get a stable connection to our patching servers. I'd recommend going over the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you have everything configured properly.

Let me know if you're still having issues!
